select moi.id, moi.user_id, moi.code, moi.start_date, moi.end_date, moi.`type`, moi.price, moi.create_date, moi.status, ui.name as userName, ui.images as userImages, ri.name as ruleName from member_order_info moi left join user_info ui on (ui.id = moi.user_id) left join rule_info ri on (ri.id = moi.type) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{memberOrderInfo.userName},'%')
AND moi.status = #{memberOrderInfo.status}
order by moi.create_date desc
SELECT IFNULL( SUM( pr.price ), 0 ) FROM member_order_info pr WHERE DATE_FORMAT( pr.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m') AND pr.status = '1'
SELECT IFNULL( count( 1 ), 0 ) FROM member_order_info oi WHERE DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y%m') AND oi.status = '1'
SELECT IFNULL( SUM( pr.price ), 0 ) FROM member_order_info pr WHERE DATE_FORMAT( pr.create_date, '%Y' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y') AND pr.status = '1'
SELECT IFNULL( count( 1 ), 0 ) FROM member_order_info oi WHERE DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y' ) = DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), '%Y') AND oi.status = '1'
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(pr.price), 0) FROM member_order_info pr WHERE pr.status = '1'

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(SUM(pr.price), 0) AS amount FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN member_order_info pr ON ( DATE_FORMAT( pr.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND pr.status = '1' ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%m-%d' ) AS days, IFNULL(COUNT(oi.id), 0) AS count FROM ( SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 0 DAY ) days UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 1 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 2 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 3 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 4 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 5 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 6 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 7 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 8 DAY ) UNION SELECT DATE_SUB( curdate(), INTERVAL + 9 DAY )) spo LEFT JOIN member_order_info oi ON ( DATE_FORMAT( oi.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) = DATE_FORMAT( spo.days, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AND oi.status = '1' ) GROUP BY days ORDER BY days ASC
